text: وَلَقَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ لَئِنۡ أَشۡرَكۡتَ لَيَحۡبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

translation.en: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate [anything] with Allah, your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers
translation.id: Dan sungguh, telah diwahyukan kepadamu dan kepada (nabi-nabi) yang sebelummu, "Sungguh, jika engkau mempersekutukan (Allah), niscaya akan terhapuslah amalmu dan tentulah engkau termasuk orang yang rugi
